bloc_0018.ligne: a major role in the war, she refused to claim

Sue accompanied Roy to Lycia,
where she married him and

Dayan built a new clan built
around his remaining Kutolah
brothers. His quest did not go without opression, but
he used his persevering leadership to create harmony
and lead the clan to become the greatest in Sace.
After returning home, Barth
was put in charge of the Ostian
military. Although devastated from the tragedies of
Hector's death and the rebellion, Barth's strict
leadership led the Ostian Military to glory once
again.
Bors returned to Ostia to help
rebuild his ravaged country.
His kind hearted nature allowed him to reunite the
people once again to bring back harmony and
prosperity to Ostia.
Wendy chose to live her life as
an Armor Knight. Her actions
gave courage to many, and she is still
remembered today as the first female
captain of an Armor Knight squad.
Although at one point he retired
from the military, Douglas
continued to receive requests from Etruria
to come back. Unable to refuse, he returned to
the palace to lead the Etrurian Army once again.
Wolt returned to Lycia with Roy
to assist him in rebuilding his
homeland. Although many  hardships stood before
them, Wolt did his best to support Roy and
played a big role in leading Lycia to prosperity.
Dorothy returned to her home-
town and led a normal life. She
was never the flashiest or the most impressive
among her comrades, but perhaps she may be the
one who led the best life afterwards...
Klein put down his bow and
became an ambassador for
Etruria. He used his diplomatic abilities to settle
many foreign affairs. While he was in office,
he made sure that Etruria was the center of a
prosperous continent.
Although the church offered
him the position of Bishop,
Saul turned it down and went off on his own,
serving the people in his own way. There are
many stories about his behavior...
Elen returned to Bern with
Guinevere to rebuild a
land ravaged by war, and to reunite a people
devastated by defeat. Her hard work and kind-
hearted nature earned her the title,
"The Saint of Bern."
Yodel continued to spread
the faith of the Elimine
Church. He eventually rose up to the position
of Archbishop, but never let his power blind
him from those in need.
After the war, Chad quit
thievery. He traveled around
the continent and dedicated his life to helping
orphan children. Not many could guess from his
actions that he started out as a thief.
Karel retired to a small
village in the mountains of
Bern and lived his life in peace. Although many
swordsmen came to him for direction, he never
tought any of them directly.
Fir set out again to
travel around the world
in training. Her name eventually spread through-
out the continent as the next Sword Saint, and
her legends were told for centuries to come.
After the war, Rutger
disappeared. Many claimed
that they had seen him around Elibe, but
none of them had any solid proof. Today,
his name appears only in records of this war...
Dieck broke up his
mercenary band and
set out to travel on his own. After that, he
continued to participate in various battles.
He left many legends behind in his wake...
Garret quit banditry
and led a normal life.
He worked and tended to his crops just as
any ordinary villager would do. He never
picked up a weapon again after the war ended.
